data.lyric:
[ti:Come Back to Earth]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Swimming (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Come Back to Earth - Mac Miller
[00:00.20]Lyricist：M. McCormick/J. Gitelman/J. Brion
[00:00.40]My regrets look just like texts I shouldn't send
[00:06.81]And I got neighbors they're more like strangers
[00:09.89]We could be friends
[00:12.54]I just need a way out of my head
[00:18.64]I'll do anything for a way out
[00:23.34]Of my head
[00:27.79]In my own way this feel like living
[00:34.12]Some alternate reality
[00:40.70]And I was drowning but now I'm swimming
[00:47.28]Through stressful waters to relief
[00:52.69]Oh the things I'd do
[00:57.79]To spend a little time in hell
[01:05.53]And what I won't tell you
[01:10.46]I prolly never even tell myself
[01:17.79]Don't you know that sunshine don't feel right
[01:21.87]When you inside all day
[01:25.46]I wish it was nice out but it looked like rain
[01:31.95]Grey skies and I'm drifting not living forever
[01:38.12]They told me it only gets better
[01:44.11]My regrets look just like texts I shouldn't send
[01:50.68]And I got neighbors they're more like strangers
[01:53.83]We could be friends
[01:56.36]I just need a way out of my head
[02:02.46]I'll do anything for a way out
[02:07.11]Of my head
data.trans:
[ti:Come Back to Earth]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Swimming (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:00.20]//
[00:00.40]我的遗憾就像我不该发的短信
[00:06.81]我有邻居他们更像是陌生人
[00:09.89]我们可以做朋友
[00:12.54]我只想找个办法摆脱我的胡思乱想
[00:18.64]只要能找到出路我什么都愿意做
[00:23.34]在我脑海里挥之不去
[00:27.79]用我自己的方式这感觉就像活着
[00:34.12]另一种现实
[00:40.70]我曾经快要窒息但现在我可以自由徜徉
[00:47.28]熬过压力重重的日子
[00:52.69]我会做的事情
[00:57.79]在地狱里待一段时间
[01:05.53]我不会告诉你的事
[01:10.46]我可能永远不会告诉自己
[01:17.79]你知道吗阳光让我感觉不太好
[01:21.87]当你整天待在家里
[01:25.46]我希望外面天气很好但好像要下雨了
[01:31.95]天空灰暗我随波逐流无法永生
[01:38.12]他们告诉我一切只会越来越好
[01:44.11]我的遗憾就像我不该发的短信
[01:50.68]我有邻居他们更像是陌生人
[01:53.83]我们可以做朋友
[01:56.36]我只想找个办法摆脱我的胡思乱想
[02:02.46]只要能找到出路我什么都愿意做
[02:07.11]在我脑海里挥之不去
